caption.title: Availability of food over the year: Crops and fruits.
caption.p: 1: harvest a year after planting; 2: harvest three years after planting; 3: harvest 3â€“4 months after planting; 4: produces only once per year; 5: harvest four months after planting; 6: harvest five years after planting only one harvest per year. *Food from the farm sub-system; # Food from the forest sub-system.
